annotation.spannedText: Rabies is a vaccine-preventable viral disease which occurs in more than 150 countries and territories

classMention.mentionClass: Rabies is a vaccine-preventable viral disease which occurs in more than 150 countries and territories

annotation.spannedText: Immediate wound cleansing with soap and water after contact with a suspect rabid animal can be life-saving

classMention.mentionClass: Immediate wound cleansing with soap and water after contact with a suspect rabid animal can be life-saving

annotation.spannedText: This is estimated to prevent hundreds of thousands of rabies deaths annually

classMention.mentionClass: This is estimated to prevent hundreds of thousands of rabies deaths annually

annotation.spannedText: Rabies is a neglected disease of poor and vulnerable populations whose deaths are rarely reported and where human vaccines and immunoglobulin are not readily available or accessible. It occurs mainly in remote rural communities where children between the age of 5–14 years are frequent victims

classMention.mentionClass: Rabies is a neglected disease of poor and vulnerable populations whose deaths are rarely reported and where human vaccines and immunoglobulin are not readily available or accessible. It occurs mainly in remote rural communities where children between the age of 5–14 years are frequent victims

annotation.spannedText: Vaccinating dogs is the most cost-effective strategy for preventing rabies in people

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccinating dogs is the most cost-effective strategy for preventing rabies in people

annotation.spannedText: Dog vaccination will drive down not only the deaths attributable to rabies but also the need for PEP as a part of dog bite patient care

classMention.mentionClass: Dog vaccination will drive down not only the deaths attributable to rabies but also the need for PEP as a part of dog bite patient care

annotation.spannedText: The same safe and effective vaccines can be used for pre-exposure immunization

classMention.mentionClass: The same safe and effective vaccines can be used for pre-exposure immunization

annotation.spannedText: In developing countries, the vaccination status of the suspected animal alone should not be considered when deciding whether to initiate prophylaxis or not

classMention.mentionClass: In developing countries, the vaccination status of the suspected animal alone should not be considered when deciding whether to initiate prophylaxis or not

annotation.spannedText: Rabies, a zoonotic disease, requires close co-ordination between animal and human health sectors at the national, regional and continental levels

classMention.mentionClass: Rabies, a zoonotic disease, requires close co-ordination between animal and human health sectors at the national, regional and continental levels

annotation.spannedText: The key towards sustaining and expanding the rabies programmes to new territories and countries has been to start small, demonstrate success and cost-effectiveness, and ensure community engagement

classMention.mentionClass: The key towards sustaining and expanding the rabies programmes to new territories and countries has been to start small, demonstrate success and cost-effectiveness, and ensure community engagement

annotation.spannedText: Stockpiles of dog and human rabies vaccine have had a catalytic effect on rabies elimination efforts

classMention.mentionClass: Stockpiles of dog and human rabies vaccine have had a catalytic effect on rabies elimination efforts
